name: 楊勝明
objective: 本課程的主要目的在講授基礎的古典線性控制系統理論.主要內容包括:物理系統之數學模式推導，Laplace轉換函數，訊號流程圖，線性系統之穩定度分析，控制系統之時域分析，根值軌跡法，頻域分析法，以及時域及頻域下之控制器設計。
schedule:
1. Introduction
2. Transfer function of physical systems
3. State equations of physical systems
4. Transient response
5. Equivalent systems
6. Transient response stability
7. Transient response stability
8. Forced response errors
9. Mid-term exam.
10.Root locus method
11.Root locus method
12.Design using root locus method
13.Frequency response method
14.Frequency response method
15.Frequency response method
16.Design using frequency response method
17.Design using state equations
18.Final exam.
scorePolicy:
平時成績：30％ (小考2次，每次10%，作業10%)
期中成績：35％
期末成績：35％
materials: ”Control Systems Engineering”, Norman Nise, 5E, 滄海圖書
